entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetPathRoot cannot handle UNC paths on unix. #109594
  • "Failed to load System.Private.CoreLib.dll (error code 0x80070002)" for self-contained binary #109593
  • [API Proposal]: Add StringBuilder overload for WebUtility.HtmlEncode #109591
  • MailAddress accepts invalid email address with consecutive dots #109590
  • Failing stepping when debugging managed code on Debug runtime #109589
  • Unexpected padding with Auto layout structs #109585
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: System.String.RSplit #109583
  • DnsAddresses throw PlatformNotSupportedException if /etc/resolv.conf is missing #109582
    Future
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unittests/TryCatchInFinally/TryCatchInFinally.cmd #109574
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Unexpected exception type from X509Certificate2 .ctor #93676
    Future
  • Improve server GOAWAY exception message in HttpClient #1966
    Future
  • System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager nuget 8.0.1 contains diffferent assembly versions. #109581
  • How to remove request-id and traceparent Header from HttpClient Request #109558
  • More frequent timeout on outbound request after upgrading to .net 8 #108599
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/StructABI/EmptyStructs/EmptyStructs.cmd #109269
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadEncodedValue #109597
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadEncodedValue #109596
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadEncodedValue #109595
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • JIT: Don't split up partially-hot call-finally pairs during 3-opt layout #109592
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [EventTrace] Update check for provider triggered GC #109587
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [WASI] debugger sockets #109584
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #109580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Release/8.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #109579
    Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • fix for `MissingTestException` #109577
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadEncodedValue #109586
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, 10.0.0
  • Report more details when dictionary layout missing #109576
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use type-level annotations for trimming/AOT analysis #109571
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-staging] handle case of Proc Index > MAX_SUPPORTED_CPUS #109386
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] handle case of Proc Index > MAX_SUPPORTED_CPUS #109385
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • Dedup remaining MemoryExtensions Span overloads #109501
    area-System.Memory
  • JIT: some deabstraction prerequisites #109575
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Haiku: Add Haiku support for CoreCLR/PAL #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • JIT: Fix codegen for misaligned double `STORE_LCL_FLD` on arm32 #109547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix file name buffer size for PAL's CreateProcess #109436
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [ILASM] Add wrappers for platform-specific SHA-256 implementations #109559
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Add AOT annotations to System.Private.Xml and System.Data.Common #109528
    area-System.Xml
  • Block exporting DllMain #109545
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change iOS PEM searcher to use PemEncoding.TryFindUtf8 #109564
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2576705 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/8.0] Disable user mapper for SslStream on Windows (TLS 1.3) (#100833) #109116
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Add `STJ.Nodes.JsonArray.Remove(All|Range)` #109472
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Simplify temporary keychain password-gen #109422
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add Span<byte> overloads for ProtectedData #109529
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0-staging] Switch to non-incremental servicing #109316
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.1
  • Convert dotnet/runtime to use the new Arcade tooling for RPMs #109526
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up code with `NET8_0_OR_GREATER` #109507
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Avoid IndexOutOfRangeException in ZipArchive #109168
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Encode missing tailcall in GC info #109512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • LINQ GroupBy Grouping can use InlineArray for first elements to avoid allocations #108569
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Avoid generic virtual dispatch for frozen collections alternate lookup #108732
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [draft] New decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Give unique event ID to TRANSACTION_CREATED_OLETX_EVENTID #109138
    area-System.Transactions, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Remove the register tp from callee saved registers in coreclr. #108696
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hook onto the restore CollectPrunedPackageReferences target and provide the list of packages to be pruned to NuGet #44694
  • CrossgenLayout is missing Inputs & Outputs which causes it to run in a no-op incremental build #44682
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44678

Closed

  • "401 Unauthorized" (`HttpRequestException`) when installing tools #44684

PullRequests

Created

  • Run 'AddImplicitDefineConstants' on 'BeforeCompile' #44695
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Fix OCI image tarball #44693
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Namespaces #44691
    untriaged
  • Avoid warning about empty NuGetPackageRoot in wpftmp projects #44688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • improve SDK incremental builds by not running redist-installer layout generation on inner loop builds #44687
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24556.1 #44685
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dev 9611 #44676
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Pass down PublicBaseURL for aspnetcore to direct it to download assets from the local artifacts assets path #44692
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Fix native install-dependencies.sh ref #44686
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add package source mappings unit-tests #44649
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the loc build to target 9.0.2xx #44563
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44656
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Browser refresh and WASM delta applier refactoring #44539
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • sln-list: Fix char conversions #44661
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build #44631
    untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify file watching #44603
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Clean up polling file watcher #35712
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Allow ProjectReferences to not have the _GetRequiredWorkloads Target #44593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add MSTest among common templates #44523
    untriaged
  • Workaround for issue 40015: nuget restore uses 'resource' instead of 'resources' #44612
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44665
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44658
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create project templates target to 10.0 #44349
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Update tfm of dotnet/format test project to current #44498
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Area - Completion - Override Completion #75787
  • Area - Formatting - 2 #75786
  • Area - Formatting #75785
  • Area - Make Method Asynchronous #75781
  • Area - Use Pattern Matching #75780
  • Area - Convert to Conditional Expression #75778
  • Area - Use Expression Body #75777
  • Area - Make Field Readonly #75776
  • Area - Pull Members Up #75775

  • Area - Use Auto Property #75771
  • Area - Organize Imports #75770
  • Area - Extract Interface #75769
  • Area - Go to Metadata #75768
  • Area - Reference Highlighting #75767
  • Area - Snippets #75766
  • Area - Event Hookup #75765

Closed

  • Convert to conditional expression refactoring disgards null-forgiving operator #38879
    Backlog
  • Primary Constructor with Self-Type Parameter Creates Uninstantiable Class Without Compiler Error #75742
  • The download URL for perfview is an old link #29389
    18.0
  • Area: MSBuildWorkspace #75580
  • VS2019 - Expression Trees: Rosyln Analyzer incorrectly suggests converting an anonymous type with property assignment to a tuple #34749
    Backlog
  • Building Roslyn.sln does not deploy servicehub binaries properly., #74155

  • Can only build Roslyn.sln a single time before building breaks. #74153
  • Fix CA1827 (DoNotUseCountWhenAnyCanBeUsed) violations in Roslyn.sln #37959

  • Add RPS typing test for repo with editorconfig at repo root #46721
  • Use Central Package Management #47664
  • Tracking issue on license/cla failures #67965
  • Another Round of Milestone Cleanup #65389
  • Style await with Keyword - Control Category #40741
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35506.11 #75784
  • Suggest exceptions to catch with try-catch block #41015
    Backlog
  • Disable code analysis scrollbar annotations #40742
    Backlog
  • VB.Net "Hide Advanced Members" is always on #40497
    Backlog
  • `Else` not offered in VB Completion after `Exit For` #40449
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense in multi-targeted projects shouldn't show warnings when APIs are merely hidden #40370
    Backlog
  • Violation of rule IDE0032 is not shown if property is declared virtual #40123
    Backlog
  • Consider folding '#region' on 'Collapse to Definitions' #40122
    Backlog
  • Remove Workspace.OnWorkspaceFailed (breaking change) #40085
    Backlog
  • Move introduce local to the top of the list #39977
    Backlog
  • local introduce variable is very inconsistent #39806
    Backlog
  • DeclarationNameCompletionProvider should suggest out parameter name #39538
    Backlog
  • CompletionLists don't help make clear which object properties are nullable and which aren't. #39516
    Backlog
  • Add an analyzer, codefix for organize imports #38716
    Backlog
  • AD0001 (KeyNotFoundException) from AbstractRemoveUnusedParametersAndValuesDiagnosticAnalyzer #38668
    Backlog
  • Extract internal class to an internal interface #38637
    Backlog
  • IDE0018 preview presents incorrect option if blank line present #38558
    Backlog
  • Inline rename throws InvalidOperationException in ASP.NET Core page #38557
    Backlog
  • Why you can not wrap a select case? #38530
    Backlog
  • Duplicate PeekDefinition results for TS IGoToDefinitionService implementation #38483
    Backlog
  • VS2017 Debugging - Use the legacy C# and VB Expression Evaluators - Deprecated #37759
    Backlog
  • Move Code Experience #37243
    Backlog
  • C#: Error check/scan/rename inactive #if blocks #37171
    Backlog
  • Extract Interface ... creates file with interface but does not navigate to it. #35531
    Backlog
  • Internal Error in the expression evaluator #35025
    Backlog
  • [Regression] Usages are not highlighted is next character is an operator #34108
    Backlog
  • [Feature] Distribute code snippets with nuget package #33146
    Backlog
  • Source control switching with large files results in lots of file change events which results in lots of file re-reading #33141
    Backlog
  • Continuing typing too fast after running "Add using" doesn't add the code fix #33140
    Backlog
  • make sure workspace related events are serialized #32551
    Backlog
  • Warning/errors/messages are not correctly grouped for multi-targeting projects #32055
    Backlog
  • Fix when a interface starting with 'I' isn't prefixed with an 'I' is a bit silly #17656
    Backlog
  • ProjectChanges.GetChangedDocuments(true) returns unchanged document #30674
    Backlog
  • Misplaced indent guides #30300
    Backlog
  • Developer mode design document #29123
    Backlog
  • SyntaxEditor could be more efficient when just operating on changes that do not involve lambda callbacks #28378
    Backlog
  • ChangeSignature: Error encountered while changing delegate signature <ChangeSignnatureCodeRefactoringProvider> #28292
    Backlog
  • Toggling Show advanced build configurations should update project's configuration #28267
    Backlog
  • In FolderView : Comment Out Selected Lines Does Not Work #27965
    Backlog
  • With a large number of files open, it takes 6 - 10 seconds bring up Rename prompt #26580
    Backlog
  • After options changed, analyzer messages are not reevaluated until you modify source code #26530
    Backlog
  • Show return types in completion #26489
    Backlog
  • global namespace imports with alias in VB #25977
    Backlog
  • Add member classification for captured locals #25924
    Backlog
  • Intellisense + Capital Letters #17275
    Backlog
  • Wiki Samples-and-Walkthroughs page has broken samples links #24545
    Backlog
  • Refactor Inline Rename command handler to not use chaining #24430
    Backlog
  • Auto completing quotation mark is not working when using CW code snippet #24376
    Backlog
  • Assertion failed: in CodeModel.CSharpCodeModelService.CodeModelEventCollector #24357
    Backlog
  • Expected behavior for Go To Definition for metadata references #24349
    Backlog
  • editorconfig not working for VB.NET in 15.5.2 #24232
    Backlog
  • Event handler references should be counted correctly for derived WPF controls #24146
    Backlog
  • Line break options ignored in C# editor #24029
    Backlog
  • Crash on applying an analyzer fixer across a large solution #23973
    Backlog
  • Refactoring icon should be applied per-diagnostic #23005
    Backlog
  • Rename Tracking appears in the lightbulb even when the new name binds (and the dotted border goes away) #22749
    Backlog
  • Potential data race in the file GCManager.cs #22425
    Backlog
  • Provide option to disable declaration completion name suggestions #22294
    Backlog
  • VS should offer to replace uninitialized `var` with inferred type if that type is initialized a few lines later #21548
    Backlog
  • Have a refactoring to add clarifying parentheses #21505
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Razor to 9.0.0-preview.24555.12 #75794

  • Test OverloadResolution.vb #75793

Merged

  • Update breaking change docs #75789

  • Fix issue with 'convert to conditional expression' and the suppression operator #75779
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

  • Classify 'await' as a control keyword #75782

  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode, Next
  • Improve pattern matching when user is likely providing camel humps #75757
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Adjust `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function #75636
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.13
  • Bind lambda in object initializer despite errors #75695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

  • Modify segmented list to grow by growth rate. #75756
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle directives in trailing trivia #75595
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Target net10.0 in RepoTasks #58823
  • Logout doesn't work in Blazor Web Application with global WASM interactivity (AntiforgeryValidationException) #58822
  • [Blazor] Unuseful message when calling InvokeAsync() #58821
  • [Blazor] Built-in components improvements #58819
  • [Blazor] Lazy loading improvements for Webassembly #58818
  • [Blazor] Challenge or equivalent API to help with auth in interactive scenarios #58817
  • [Blazor] NavigationManager.NotFound or equivalent API for SSR #58816
  • [Blazor] Add a way to specify a page as the Notfound fragment #58815
  • [Blazor] Pass assemblies registered in MapComponents to the Router component automatically. #58814
  • Blazor Streaming Rendering does not show intermediate state when @attribute [Authorize(Roles = "group1")] is used #58813
  • Event-like extensions for authentication. #58812
    Backlog
  • [Blazor] Improving ASP.NET Core integration #58811
    Backlog
  • OpenAPI polymorphic response without base class #58810

Closed

  • AOT warnings on minimal API Map* methods outside of Program.cs, especially in web library projects #58678
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #58803

PullRequests

Created

  • Set up Windows installer build for the VMR #58820
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update Router.cs #57559
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/2.3] Always build modules #58809
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24553.6 #58776
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add examples to AddOpenApi extension method/overloads #58808
    feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Fix local failure in GET_GracefulServerShutdown_AbortRequestsAfterHostTimeout #58747
    area-networking
  • Remove RequiresUnreferencedCode in IJSInProcessObjectReference #58713
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor
  • Support returning OpenAPI document in YAML from MapOpenApi #58616
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView does not display group header when using the new handler CollectionViewHandler2 #25718
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Shapes.RoundRectangle has been Garbage Collected #25716
  • NU1100 & NU1103 396 erreurs je ne sais plus quoi faire #25714
  • [MAUI]The 'Pages' button text of G3 and G7 pages is black #25709
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [MAUI]When clicking on I8-View header and footer (Horizontal grid), the names and locations of some monkeys on the page were truncated. #25708
  • Crash on IOS adding items to an ObservableCollection after Render #25707
  • XAML loader fails after new element added in project #25705
  • drawing text is not same as in winform with same font and font size? #25703

Closed

  • [testing] Some builds hang when running iOS samples or template tests #25695
  • .NET MAUI Blazor CSS Isolation bug #25669
  • vs 2022 with .net 9 #25704
  • [iOS] Remove new iOS18 Tabs from Catalyst and iPad #25136
    .NET 8 SR10
  • wrong version in latest release #25712
  • MAUI Geolocation from a known address #25698

PullRequests

Created

  • Setup lane to run CV2 and CV1 tests #25719
  • Flag #25717
  • Ensure that MeasureInvalidated properly propagates up #25715
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #25711
    area-testing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enable snapshot tests on Catalyst #25710
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-testing
  • Accessibility iOS - Editor - improvements #25702
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, t/a11y
  • Disable NSToolbar Tabs (#25137) #25700
    area-controls-tabbedpage

Merged

  • Try not run on arm64 #25701
  • Skip invalidation on propagation (#25652) #25696
    .NET 8 SR10
  • [Testing] Reenable test ported from Xamarin.UITest #25624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fix minor online API docs warnings #25685
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865
    area-xaml
  • Revert to CollectionViewHandler and CarouselViewHandler for tests #25692
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Fix for the screen does not display when changing the CurrentPage of a TabbedPage #25690
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Disable `MeasureInvalidated` propagation by default / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Templated indicator view - improvements #25642
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Better exception for using viewCell with collection View #25681
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for picker on hidden page opens after back navigation in Android #25319
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for OnAppearing of Page called again, although this page was on already replaced NavigationStack #25596
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Character spacing in button - fix #25657
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Testing] UITest to measure layout passes on a common scenario #25671
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • made FilterQuality configurable for Resizetizer #25686
    community ✨
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • BarBackground with Brush in TabbedPage on theme change #24425
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR2
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
    area-layout, area-controls-button
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Re-Enable Template Tests #25674
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source Generators #35057
  • Is EF9 rc.2 slower than EF8? #35053

Closed

  • EF Core generates different SQL queries in Windows and Linux environments #35052

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35054

Merged

  • Merge branch 'release/9.0' into release/9.0-staging #35056
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0' into release/8.0-staging #35055
  • Update branding to 9.0.1 #35049
  • Add requiredness to the debug view for navigations #35037

Updated

  • Fix to #35024 - Query could not be translated when using a static ICollection/IList field #35029
